subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which historical palace is located in Jaipur?
question_hi: जयपुर में किस अभिगमनता पर्ची है?
explanation_en:
The City Palace is a historical palace located in Jaipur.
In Hindi, it translates to: 'शहर पर्ची एक जयपुर में स्थित है।
explanation_hi: जयपुर में शहर पर्ची एक अभिगमनत स्थित होंगे।

subject: Rajasthan Examinations
question_en: What is the significance of Chittorgarh Fort in Rajasthan?
A_en: It was built during the rule of Maharaja Surajmal in 16th century.
B_en: It was built by Maharaja Pratap Singh in 18th century.
C_en: It is popular for its architectural marvels
explanation_en: The Chittorgarh Fort was built by Maharaja Pratap Singh in the 18th century and is popular for its beautiful architecture.
explanation_hi: चीटोर सराजसत्त मिंर, चीटर सराजसत्त मिंर, चीटोर
